value.title: How to Resolve Publish to Web Error Message   Contact Your Admin to Enable Embed Code Creation
value.excerpt: If you tried the option Publish to Web in Power BI recently, you might have seen the error saying "Contact Your Admin to Enable Embed Code Creation".
